text: David Frank (24 September 1958 â€“ November 2021) was a Kenyan-born British businessman. He was the CEO of Dial Square 86 and the chairman of The RightsXchange. He was the founder of RDF Media and the onetime CEO of Zodiak Media SA. Frank died in November 2021, aged 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British businesspeople
title: David Frank (media executive)
